text:
rk-1, and the white-footed mouse (Peromyscus leucopus), was implicated as the carrier.
  
More recently, cases of HPS stemming from related hantaviruses have been documented in Argentina, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Paraguay, and Uruguay, making HPS a pan-hemispheric disease.
  
                
  References
  
Information for this page was developed using the CDC video Preventing Hantavirus Disease and resource articles listed in the bibliography.",CDC,Hantavirus
